commonText: If now’s not a good time, it’s okay.
I want to give this a try. Is that alright?
Mind if I come over for a second?
Today’s been great—I made a new friend!
Sorry… am I in your way?
weirdText: LMAO, this is what broke you?
You sure you wanna argue about *this*?
And here I thought it was something serious.
Bro, what are you even doing?
abstractText: Man, what can I say? Mamba out.

subtitlePairs.value: You look clueless.There’s a mask over there—go get it.
Congrats.This is who you are on the internet now.Go explore.
And stay away from those with bad intentions.
The internet has its share of bad people.
You’re still too weak—keep your distance.
You’ve seen a lot online. Now, go meet more people.
The internet is beautiful. But do you remember how it all began?
